Uses of Interface
jakarta.xml.ws.Binding

  • Packages that use Binding 
    Package Description
    jakarta.xml.ws
    This package contains the core Jakarta XML Web Services APIs.
    jakarta.xml.ws.http
    This package defines APIs specific to the HTTP binding.
    jakarta.xml.ws.soap
    This package defines APIs specific to the SOAP binding.

    • Uses of Binding in jakarta.xml.ws

      Methods in jakarta.xml.ws that return Binding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Binding Endpoint.getBinding()
      Returns the binding for this endpoint.
      Binding BindingProvider.getBinding()
      Get the Binding for this binding provider.

    • Uses of Binding in jakarta.xml.ws.http

      Subinterfaces of Binding in jakarta.xml.ws.http 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  HTTPBinding
      The HTTPBinding interface is an abstraction for the XML/HTTP binding.

    • Uses of Binding in jakarta.xml.ws.soap

      Subinterfaces of Binding in jakarta.xml.ws.soap 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SOAPBinding
      The SOAPBinding interface is an abstraction for the SOAP binding.
